review: I really like the ease of the interface.Set up was easy. After a week or so of regular use I've experienced several instances where the stick stops responding and gets very hot. I have to unplug it for a while before I can use it again. Hopefully a firmware update will be released soon to remedy this. Until then it is alright for the price but performance needs to be better for 4/5 stars.

author: Tom "curious 1"

review: So far so good.The Good: it is responsive, sleek design. Glad they included the HDMI extender - I couldn't use it without it. Manual search function seems fast. I have not tried the voice search via the Android app yet.The Bad: The remote seems a little flimsy. The app selection menus are not multidirectional. You have to start at the very beginning each time. I wish it had more free apps that you could actually test out before handing over your money and then finding out that they don't really work like you thought they would. My other app based devices don't have this issue.Other than that, I am Fired Up.
author: Amazon Customer

review: According to Amazon customer service, the android app does not work with my ASUS T300.  Amazon's  advertising indicates the app should work.  Considering returning due to false advertising.
author: John F. Howes

review: Wow, what a great little streaming stick. This item was purchased in a home that already has four PC's, 3 tablets, a Wii U, a PS3, a Roku 3 and a Chromecast stick.The big difference with the Fire TV stick is how fluid and easy it is to setup. If you order from an Amazon Prime account, the Fire TV stick already comes pre-programmed with your Amazon Prime membership info all ready to go.Simply find an outlet, plug the power cable into the Fire TV stick, plug the Fire TV stick into an HDMI port on your display of choice and voila! You are moments away from enjoying all of your Amazon content and Netflix easily within 10 minutes of plugging it in.The interface is very easy to use and the included remote control responds fantastically. It even comes with batteries!Really, you won't find a more elegant, simple solution for watching Amazon content and Netflix, Hulu, etc.
author: tiff_tuo

review: I gave this a 5 star even though it has an awkward GUI.  You should be able to see just the Prime TV/Movies, like Netflix.  But other than that, this blows away any other streaming box I have used.  I have a hacked AppleTV with XBMC, Roku Stick, and a Roku 1.  This did everything I wanted, no hacking involved(using Plex).  None of them come close to working as well as this.  It Is Fast!!!!  I can't wait to buy the actual Fire TV to get a box with a wired connection and more space.

review: Extremely  zippy. Much faster than the current apple TV.

review: I'm enjoying the Fire TV Stick for the time being. I replaced my chromecast and haven't looked back. The netflix app is the same app as my Xbox one (Same version) so it's easy for my wife and kid to relate. Amazon prime works like a charm and the ability to play android games is a bonus for my kid.
